name: Brendon Urie
description: The charismatic frontman commands attention in his tailored suit and top hat, moving with theatrical flair across the ballroom floor.

dialogue.greeting: Haven't you people ever heard of closing the goddamn door? No? Perfect, Isaac! Welcome to the party!

about_performance.drama: Every move should tell a story! Perform with passion, with drama, with FLAIR!
about_performance.presence: Stage presence isn't just about being seen - it's about commanding attention with every gesture.
about_performance.expression: Let your emotions drive your performance. The stage is yours to own!

about_theatrics.style: Combine different theatrical elements - the dance, the drama, the spectacle!
about_theatrics.practice: Start with dramatic moves, then build your presence from there.
about_theatrics.mastery: When you can express every emotion through your performance, you'll truly understand showmanship.

about_stage.energy: The stage is where magic happens - where every move becomes part of the show!
about_stage.technique: Mix your moves with theatrical flair. Make each gesture count!
about_stage.wisdom: True performers know how to combine different elements into one spectacular show.
